00009 ######################################################################
00010 #
00011 #  Prints questions with the answer rule at the right, all aligned.
00012 #  (for use by AlignedList object below)
00013 #
00014 sub aligned_print_q {
00015   my $self = shift;
00016   my (@questions) = @_;
00017   my $length = $self->{ans_rule_len};
00018   my ($numbered,$equals) = ($self->{numbered},$self->{equals});
00019   my ($valign,$align) = ($self->{valign},$self->{align});
00020   my ($sep,$tsep) = ($self->{spacing},$self->{tex_spacing});
00021   my ($rsep) = ($self->{row_spacing});
00022   my $i=1; my $quest; my $rest;
00023 
00024   my $out = "";
00025   if ($main::displayMode =~ m/^HTML/) {
00026     $out = "\n<P>\n<TABLE BORDER=0 CELLPADDING=0 CELLSPACING=$sep>\n";
00027     foreach $quest (@questions) {
00028       if (ref($quest) eq 'ARRAY') {($quest,$rest) = @{$quest}} else {$rest = ''}
00029       $out .= "<TR VALIGN=$valign>";
00030       $out .= "<TD><B>" . $i++ . ".</B> &nbsp;</TD>" if ($numbered);
00031       $out .= "<TD ALIGN=$align>$quest</TD>";
00032       $out .= "<TD>=</TD>" if ($equals);
00033       $out .= "<TD>" . ans_rule($length) . $rest . "</TD></TR>\n";
00034       $out .= "<TR><TD HEIGHT=\"$rsep\"></TD></TR>\n" if ($rsep);
00035     }
00036     $out .= "</TABLE>\n";
00037   } elsif ($main::displayMode eq 'Latex2HTML') {
00038     $out = "\\par\n\\begin{rawhtml}".
00039       "<TABLE BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=$sep CELLPADDING=0>\\end{rawhtml}\n";
00040     foreach $quest (@questions) {
00041       if (ref($quest) eq 'ARRAY') {($quest,$rest) = @{$quest}} else {$rest = ''}
00042       $out .= "\\begin{rawhtml}<TR VALIGN=$valign>";
00043       $out .= "<TD VALIGN=MIDDLE><B>".$i++.".</B>&nbsp;</TD>" if ($numbered);
00044       $out .= "<TD ALIGN=$align>\\end{rawhtml}$quest\\begin{rawhtml}</TD>";
00045       $out .= "<TD>=</TD>" if ($equals);
00046       $out .= "<TD>\\end{rawhtml}".ans_rule($length).$rest.
00047     "\\begin{rawhtml}</TD></TR>\\end{rawhtml}";
00048       $out .= "\\begin{rawhtml}<TR><TD HEIGHT=\"$rsep\"></TD></TR>\\end{rawhtml}\n" if ($rsep);
00049     }
00050     $out .= "\\begin{rawhtml}</TABLE>\n\\end{rawhtml}";
00051   } elsif ($main::displayMode eq 'TeX') {
00052     my $num = ''; $num = 'r' if ($numbered);
00053     my $algn = 'r'; $algn = 'l' if (uc($align) eq "LEFT");
00054     $algn = 'c' if (uc($align) eq "CENTER");
00055     $algn .= "c" if ($equals);
00056     $out = "\n\\par\\begin{tabular}{${num}${algn}l}\n";
00057     foreach $quest (@questions) {
00058       if (ref($quest) eq 'ARRAY') {($quest,$rest) = @{$quest}} else {$rest = ''}
00059       $out .= $i++ . ".\\ &" if ($numbered);
00060       $out .= $quest . "&";
00061       $out .= "=&" if ($equals);
00062       $out .= "\\ ". ans_rule($length) . $rest . "\\\\ \\noalign{\\kern $tsep}\n";
00063     }
00064     $out .= "\\end{tabular}\n";
00065   } else {
00066     $out = "Error: std_aligned_print_q: Unknown displayMode: ".
00067       $main::displayMode;
00068   }
00069   $out;
00070 }

00072 ######################################################################
00073 #
00074 #  Genarate a new AlignedList object
00075 #
00076 #     $al = new_aligned_list(options)
00077 #
00078 #  Where "options" can be taken from among:
00079 #
00080 #      valign => "placement"     Sets the vertical alignment for the table
00081 #                                (default is valign => "MIDDLE")
00082 #
00083 #      align => "placement"      Sets the horizontal aligmnent for the first
00084 #                                column of the table
00085 #                                (default is align => "RIGHT")
00086 #
00087 #      spacing => n              Sets the CELLSPACING value for the table
00088 #                                (default is spacing => 5)
00089 #
00090 #      tex_spacing => dimen      Extra spacing between rows
00091 #                                (default is tex_spacing => "0pt")
00092 #
00093 #      numbered => 1 or 0        1 means the problems should be numbered.
00094 #                                0 means no numbers for the problems.
00095 #
00096 #      equals => 1 or 0          1 means include a column of equal signs between
00097 #                                  the questions and the answer blocks.
00098 #                                0 means no column of equals.
00099 #
00100 #      ans_rule_len => n         Sets the length of the answer rule
00101 #
00102 #
00103 sub new_aligned_list {
00104   new AlignedList(random(1,2000,1), \&aligned_print_q, \&std_print_a, @_);
00105 }
00106 
00107 package AlignedList;
00108 
00109 @AlignedList::ISA = qw( ChoiceList );
00110 
00111 sub new {
00112     my $type = shift;
00113     my ($rnd,$pq,$pa,@params) = @_;
00114     my $self = ChoiceList->new($rnd,$pq,$pa);
00115     $self = bless $self, $type;
00116     my ($var,$val);
00117     @params = (
00118         valign => "MIDDLE",
00119     align => "RIGHT",
00120         numbered => 0,
00121         equals => 1,
00122         ans_rule_len => 10,
00123         spacing => 5,
00124         tex_spacing => "0pt",
00125         @params
00126     );
00127     while (@params) {
00128     $var = shift(@params); $val = shift(@params);
00129     $self->{$var} = $val;
00130     }
00131     return $self;
00132 }
00133 
00134 sub qa {
00135     my $self = shift;
00136     $self->SUPER::qa(@_);
00137     my $n = scalar(@{$self->{questions}});
00138     $self->{selected_q} = [@{$self->{questions}}];
00139     $self->{selected_a} = [@{$self->{answers}}];
00140     $self->{slice} = [0..$n];
00141     $self->{shuffle} = [0..$n];
00142     $self->{inverted_shuffle} = [0..$n];
00143 }
00144 
00145 sub selectQA {
00146     my $self = shift;
00147     $self->{selected_q} = [@{$self->{questions}}[@{$self->{slice}}]];
00148     $self->{selected_a} = [@{$self->{answers}}[@{$self->{slice}}]];
00149     $self->{shuffle} = [0..scalar(@{$self->{slice}})];
00150     $self->{inverted_shuffle} = [0..scalar(@{$self->{slice}})];
00151 }
00152 
00153 sub correct_ans {
00154   my $self = shift;
00155   return @{$self->{selected_a}}
00156 }
